remarks: The diagonal functor is a functor from the base category to the functor category.  Another way of saying this is that the constant functor ` ( y e. D |-> X ) ` is a construction that is natural in ` X ` (and covariant).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2017.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jan-2017.)
statement:
diagval.l $e |- L = ( C DiagFunc D ) $.
diagval.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
diagval.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. Cat ) $.
diagcl.q $e |- Q = ( D FuncCat C ) $.
diagcl $p |- ( ph -> L e. ( C Func Q ) ) $.
